They believe that they are the greater chosen people and that the goyim (non-jews) are the servant/slave race. They try to weaken and control every race in every country on earth. If you need to know who rules over you, ask yourself "who can I not criticize?". Jews are the slime of the earth and need to be removed. Imagining a world without jews is a world where people are strong, proud, more cohesive, and advances in technology are much more frequent.
the jews have needed to go for a long time, and have been expelled from every single country they have ever been in since the dawn of time-- and for good reason.
If they call themself a jew, they are not your friend. they are not working with you. they do not have your interest at heart. they want to use you as their creed commands.
fuck kikes
